subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A stream of Yankees icons from Yogi Berra to Reggie Jackson to Joe Torre were at Yankee Stadium for the unveiling of a monument to George Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ principal owner, who died in July.
snippet: A stream of Yankees icons from Yogi Berra to Reggie Jackson to Joe Torre were at Yankee Stadium for the unveiling of a monument to George Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ principal owner, who died in July.
